text.title: Slovenians reject referendum to recognize same-sex marriage
text.head: Slovenians reject referendum to recognize same-sex marriage

Sources

list.item: Tim Hume. "Slovenia rejects same-sex marriage by large margin in referendum" — CNN , December 21, 2015
